Invocation for entering the restroom.ARABIC_TEXT: ([بِسْمِ اللَّهِ] اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبائِث).
Invocation for entering the restroom.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: ((Bismil-lah) allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba-ith.)
Invocation for entering the restroom.TRANSLATED_TEXT: ((In the name of Allah).  O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.)
